ai-tha-ap101:1.4_0: about all the monasteries or their heart.
ai-tha-ap101:2.1_0: but I don’t have a refuge,
ai-tha-ap101:2.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap101:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap101:4.2_0: Then the kings have been clearly seen and heard.
ai-tha-ap101:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap101:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap101:7.1_0: The ninth ruler of the senior monks who rule.
